Research Postgraduate

Imperial College London - Speech and Audio Processing

I am studying for a PhD student in the Speech and Audio Processing (SAP) Laboratory at Imperial College London. My interests lie in the use of microphone array processing techniques for the assistance of patients with dementia-induced hearing impairments.
